metadata.title: USN-5369-1 -- oslo.utils vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that oslo.utils incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5369-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-oslo.utils - 3.35.0-0ubuntu1.1 python-oslo.utils-doc - 3.35.0-0ubuntu1.1 python3-oslo.utils - 3.35.0-0ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
